answerText: electronegativity [10] In this effect, a difference in electronegativity between two atoms bound by a sigma bond causes the electron cloud to be attracted to the more electronegative atom. The positive version of this effect caused by alkyl groups helps stabilize tertiary carbocations.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Virginia + Dartmouth | 4 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This quantity increases for elements going upward and rightward on the periodic table. For 10 points each: [10] Name this quantity, defined as the power an atom has to attract electrons to itself.
